SummaryEnglish:
This is Hiragana Gunma--a strange place that exists somewhere in the world.

While it may be strange, it's also a place of kindness and warmth. Just as there are many different people around you, we see many kinds of strange residents here as well. What might Gunma-chan be up to here in Hiragana Gunma?

1.TitleEnglish: Hello, Gunma-chan! / Off to Adventure We GO! / Yayoihime Appears
1.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan lives happily in the mysterious world of "Gunma". One day, he comes across his friends arguing with each other. / On a beautiful day, Gunma-chan and Aoma decide to go on an adventure to the village of the Haniwa tribe. / Gunma-chan and Meemi are taking a walk when they meet a princess named Yayoihime who is handing out strawberries.

2.TitleEnglish: What to Do on Sunday? / Factories Are Awesome! / Haniwa Concert
2.SummaryEnglish: On a rainy Sunday, Gunma-chan is bored at home when he wants to play. So he decides to think of a "fun game". / Gunma-chan and his friends came to visit the Tomioka factory with his mother's friend. / Gunma-chan and his friends are invited to a concert by the Haniwa tribe and see the "Three Misses" perform.

3.TitleEnglish: Teach Us! Oh Wise One / Stars Have It Rough / Secrets of the Mirrors
3.SummaryEnglish: The curious Gunma-chan goes to see the Wise One, who knows everything. What will he teach him today? / Gunma-chan is strolling along in a happy mood as usual when he meets a group of four people who sigh deeply. / Yayoihime, the princess of the Strawberry Tribe, is on a tasting campaign for the strawberry Yayoihime today.

4.TitleEnglish: A Day with My Uncle / A Bit Tired? Gunma-chan / Where Are You Gunma-chan?
4.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan went out with his favorite uncle. He took him to a Haniwa race, which attracts many adults in Gunma. / Gunma-chan, always energetic, looks somewhat tired today. / Trouble is brewing everywhere in Gunma! If only Gunma-chan were here at a time like this...

5.TitleEnglish: Yuumi and Gunma-chan / Global Haniwa Super Field Day / My Mom's Job
5.SummaryEnglish: Gunma and Yuumi are on an errand for their mother. Yuumi seems to be having a lot of fun, but Gunma-chan seems to be in a pain. / The Global Haniwa Super Field Day, a sporting event for the Haniwa by the Haniwa, will be held. / Mom works in a specialty store. Gunma-chan works hard with his mother, stocking products and helping out.

6.TitleEnglish: The Wise One Loses Motivation / Arrival of the Ninja! / So long, Meows!
6.SummaryEnglish: The curious Gunma-chan goes to see the Wise One today. But the Wise One doesn't seem to get out of bed. / Gunma-chan is resting in his room. When he wakes up, he feels a presence and sees a mysterious shadow...no way! / The popular rock band "Meows" is toasting with catnip juice in the middle of the day.

7.TitleEnglish: Let's Go Camping! / Who to Play With? / Let's Go to the Hot Springs
7.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan, his father, and Aoma go camping together. / When Aoma and Meemi come to Gunma-chan's house to play, the three of them begin to argue about how to play together. / Lots of famous hot springs in Hiragana "Gunma"! Today Gunma-chan and his uncle go on a tour of Gunma's hot springs.

8.TitleEnglish: Meemi and Her Dad / Aoma Stays at Home / Gunma-chan's Odd Morning
8.SummaryEnglish: Meemi's mother is an actor and her father is a novelist. At home, her father is stuck in writing. / Aoma stays at home alone. His parents told him to do his homework, eat properly, and play games for one hour a day. / Gunma-chan wakes up in the morning, eats his breakfast, and goes out to play. The day begins as usual but...

9.TitleEnglish: An Adventure Above the Clouds / Art Is a Big Bang! / Let's Go-Go with Strawberries!
9.SummaryEnglish: On a beautiful day, Gunma-chan and Meemi decided to go on an adventure. / Gunma-chan and his mother came to a private exhibition of a famous artist, "Diver Kuhatsu." / Yayoihime, the princess of the strawberry tribe, was worried that her strawberry "Yayoihime" was not becoming well known.

10.TitleEnglish: Our Moms and Ninjas / Teach Us More, Wise One! / A Fun Road Trip
10.SummaryEnglish: The Ninja Sisters, looking for clients, came to Gunma-chan's mother's place for business. /  The curious Gunma-chan goes to see the Wise One again. Today Gunma-chan seems to have a very difficult question. / Today, Gunma-chan, Yuumi, their father, and their uncle went out by car. Where to go and what to do, let the fun drive begin!

11.TitleEnglish: Haniwa's Majority Rules / Haniwa Boat Race / Gunma-chan Gets Sick
11.SummaryEnglish: The Haniwa people of Haniwa Village are divided in half and are in violent conflict with each other. What is going on...? / Today Gunma-chan is going out with his favorite uncle. Uncle took him to the Haniwa Boat Race. / Energetic Gunma-chan is sick. It seems he has caught the flu.

12.TitleEnglish: Haniwa Meets Daruma / Letâ€™s Play at Home! / Konja Rap Appears!
12.SummaryEnglish: In front of Gunma-chan, who was relaxing outside, Haniwa appeared. / Gunma-chan and Aoma decide to play at Gunma-chan's house. Today, they have a very special "fun" thing to do. / Yayoihime is in the midst of a tasting campaign of strawberries "Yayoihime." Suddenly, a rapper appeared with a lively rhythm and began to pound out rhymes.

13.TitleEnglish: Reach for the Stars, Gunma-chan! / Arrival to Planet Unknown! / Gunma-chan Does His Best
13.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious voice calls to the sleeping Gunma-chan. When he wakes up, he finds himself on a station platform in the midnight. / The Gunma-chan team dodged an attack by space pirates and continued their space travel. / Gunma-chan tries to fight the crisis on the Planet Unknown with Gunma Power.

1.TitleEnglish: Gunma-chan, To Be Continued! / My Little Sister, Yuumi / Aoma's Lie
1.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan contemplates what it means for things to continue. Yuumi is dissatisfied with being a younger sibling while Gunma-chan has similar sentiments about being the eldest. Aoma gets caught in a tough situation after telling a lie.

2.TitleEnglish: Haniwa Art Festival / Moms Are Hard Workers / Udon is Awesome!
2.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan, Aoma, and Meemi visit the Haniwa Art Festival and considers what counts as "art". A look into a day of the life of Gunma-chan's Mom and her many jobs. Uncle Akio takes Gunma-chan, Aoma, and Meemi to eat udon noodles.

3.TitleEnglish: Daruma Fortune / Jomo Karuta Tournament / Gunma-chan's Toothache
3.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan, Aoma, and Meemi visits the Daruma Shrine and pulls omikuji fortunes. Gunma-chan enters the Jomo Karuta Tournament. Gunma-chan gets a toothache and learns about oral health.

4.TitleEnglish: Who's the Culprit? / Was It Better Back Then? / Ninja Sisters at Work
4.SummaryEnglish: Meemi's Dad attempts to solve a mystery surrounding missing puddings. Gunma-chan debates whether the past was better with Kofun-sama and King Daruma. The Ninja Sisters search for a new business venture.

5.TitleEnglish: Gunma-chan, My Big Brother / Cheers at the Hot Spring Inn! / Meemi Meets the Meows
5.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan and Yuumi has a different approach on how to solve problems. Gunma-chan goes on a trip to a hot springs inn together with his family. Meemi meets the Meows, her favorite band.

6.TitleEnglish: Aoma's Manga Project / Gunma-chan Learns About the Internet / It's a Ghost
6.SummaryEnglish: Aoma decides to become a manga author and recruits Gunma-chan and Meemi. The Wise One teaches Gunma-chan about the internet. Gunma-chan meets a ghost that lives in his house.

7.TitleEnglish: Off to the Auto Race!! / Yayoihime's Angry Innovation / Taking It Easy
7.SummaryEnglish: Uncle Akio takes Gunma-chan to his first Auto Race. Yayoihime goes on a rampage to create a new way to market Yayoihime strawberries. Uncle Akio teaches Gunma-chan how to take it easy.

8.TitleEnglish: What Will Meemi Do? / Daruma vs. Haniwa / What's Wrong, Gunma-chan?
8.SummaryEnglish: Meemi finds herself perplexed after Gunma-chan and Aoma throw a fit. Gunma-chan witness rituals by Daruma and Haniwa as things get competitive. Aoma and Meemi corner Gunma-chan for not speaking up enough.

9.TitleEnglish: Enter, the Lazy One / The Ninja Sisters' Dilemma / Haniwa Have It Tough, Too
9.SummaryEnglish: The Wise One loses motivation and becomes the Lazy One. The Ninja Sisters hit a roadblock and contemplate the future of their careers. Gunma-chan meets Haniwa-san...or does he?

10.TitleEnglish: Donuts, Donuts / Tuning in with Mom / Konja Rap Appears Again
10.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan ponders how to share two donuts. Gunma-chan watches an episode of Gun-Gunmer with his mom. Konja Rap makes his second appearance and everyone showcases their musical talent.

11.TitleEnglish: Bing-chan, from a Planet Far, Far Away / Warrior Haniwa-sama Appears / Let's Make Sweets
11.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan, Aoma, and Meemi meet Bing-chan, an alien from a distant planet. Gunma-chan attends the Great Haniwa Gratitude Festival and meets Warrior Haniwa. Gunma-chan, Yuumi, Aoma, and Meemi learn how to make snacks.

12.TitleEnglish: Snowboarding is Fun! / Gunma-chan Struggles Again / Animation Studios are Awesome!
12.SummaryEnglish: Uncle Akio takes Gunma-chan, Aoma, and Meemi snowboarding. Gunma-chan feels lonely and finds solace in his imaginary friend. Gunma-chan visits the Haniwa Animation Studio and learns the ins and outs of creating anime.

13.TitleEnglish: Gunma's Mysterious Underground Empire / Legendary Treasures / Gunma-chan Tries Really, Really Hard
13.SummaryEnglish: Gunma-chan, Uncle Akio, Aoma, and Meemi visit Gunma's kofun site and wander into an alternate world beneath Gunma in the Season 2 finale.
